column2: I was not a fan of it until I had it here
column3: I really like the brisket here. The peach cobbler was just alright
column4: did the job. This time I got 2 different sauces
column5: one with the brisket and pulled pork
column6: thin and vinegary-y. The other sauce came with the ribs and was much better suited for it
column8: sweeter and enough to bag the elusive fifth star.
